relation: Fun events are movie nights and game nights.
The food is just great. They have delicious varieties of food every day.
Dorm life is awsome. The dorm peers are fun to hang out with.
The academic classes might not always be easy, but the teachers are fun to be with.
It is easy to find friends
Pearl River Community College is a great college. It is an exciting school to attend. The campus might be small, but there are a lot of fun activities to attend while at Pearl River.
pageTitle: Pearl River Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {73527=This is my first semester here so my attitude on this could change. This is four out of five stars for me because were I stay at their is not a lot of room to put your stuff in. My roommate is a a**hole and is messy. Lamar hall and marion hall is where you need to stay at. They have nicer dorms and their s room to put all your stuff in., 90958=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Carmenlynn from Picayune, MS 03/02/2012 Reviewer is A past student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 21 Categories Comments Campus Safety security is spot on. Bang for the buck it is the perfect amount for me and its well worth it. What to do for fun hangout with friends you know and trust, join any activities and also watch your fellow college student play against other schools. go wild cats. Food and Dining many options to choose from in the cafe but long lines just to eat. Dorm Life i'm not sure about dorm life but i heard that is small but yet is surrounded with campus security just to make sure that everyone is safe and sound. Academic Rigor
